snippet: The high-profile sports columnist, who has frequently written about politics, has spent most of his career at the tabloid.
abstract: High-profile sports columnist Mike Lupica's future is unclear after layoffs at Daily News, which is said to be losing $20 million a year.
lead_paragraph: The high-profile sports columnist, who has frequently written about politics, has spent most of his career at the tabloid.

headline.main: Mike Lupica’s Future at The Daily News Is Unclear After Layoffs
headline.print_headline: Lupica’s Future Is Unclear After Layoffs at Daily News
